class.name: bbr.b2b.regional.logistic.couriers.entities.Courier
class.sql-query: SELECT c.id, c.code, c.description FROM logistica.courier AS c JOIN logistica.hiredcourier AS hc ON c.id = hc.courier_id WHERE hc.vendor_id = :vendor_id

SELECT c.id, c.code, c.description FROM logistica.dodelivery AS dd JOIN logistica.hiredcourier AS hc ON hc.vendor_id = dd.vendor_id JOIN logistica.courier AS c ON hc.courier_id = c.id WHERE dd.id = :dodelivery_id

SELECT c.id FROM logistica.courier AS c JOIN logistica.hiredcourier AS hc ON c.id = hc.courier_id JOIN logistica.vendor AS v ON hc.vendor_id = v.id JOIN logistica.dodelivery AS dd ON v.id = dd.vendor_id WHERE dd.id = :dodelivery_id
SELECT c.id FROM logistica.courier AS c JOIN logistica.hiredcourier AS hc ON c.id = hc.courier_id JOIN logistica.vendor AS v ON hc.vendor_id = v.id WHERE v.id = :vendorid
